snippet: S.M.U. won its third American Athletic Conference game and improved to 14-0 for the season, tying the overall record of No. 22 South Carolina, the only other undefeated Division I team.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Southern Methodist men's basketball team defeats Cincinnati, 59-57; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: S.M.U. won its third American Athletic Conference game and improved to 14-0 for the season, tying the overall record of No. 22 South Carolina, the only other undefeated Division I team.

headline.print_headline: S.M.U. (14-0) Edges Cincinnati; Arizona Falls to U.C.L.A.
headline.main: S.M.U. (14-0) Edges Cincinnati; Arizona Falls to U.C.L.A.
